n = int(input())
p = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

count = 0
for i in range(1, n - 1):  # for all peaks
    if p[i - 1] < p[i] < p[i + 1] or p[i + 1] < p[i] < p[i - 1]:
        count += 1

print(count)
